column1:
Odeinoichus,"2016-01-01T21:08:55.69Z","Howling Ice Speedorz","

Set #70106 Ice Tower: As Speedorz go this set is, fine, it doesn’t have much to it so really I think unless you’re going for a complete card collection or Speedorz collection you’ll be looking elsewhere for your LEGO Legends of Chima purchases. We’ll go over the pros and cons now and then make final thoughts.

column2: Winzar’s Speedor is included in this set and looks pretty impressive, I like the print on this one it stands out and really matches the character well.
Includes the Winzar, Huntor W4, Chi Jahak, Flamious and Dikut Collectible Cards.
Main model uses a lot of nice white and clear blue parts.
Winzar minifigure has double-sided torso print, double-sided facial print, leg printing and great looking head piece.
Winzar’s accessories are again not as impressive for weapons as other Speedorz sets. Also he doesn’t have his chest armour piece.
Main model build in the set is decent but uses fewer pieces than it should for a decent sized tower and it looks like it could use a better designed base.

column1: Overall I feel that this Speedorz set is pretty nice for what it is, a cheap method to get Winzar and his Speedor, however recommending it is more for completists or fans of the game. I will admit that this set works as a decent challenge for the Speedorz game, it’s a tower and you need to knock it over to get the CHI Orb, which is included in this set. So for this one I’m recommending it only for completists and only if you can find it on sale, full price is not worth it for this one.
